alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHERN LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sparta to Polaris, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Westerville, Johnstown, Sunbury, Utica, Hanover, Polaris, Galena, Hartford, St. Louisville, Interstate 71 at US Route 36/State Route 37, Fredonia, US Route 62 at State Route 661, Olive Green, Purity, Center Village and Fallsburg. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 122 and 132, and between mile markers 135 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
